data.headline: Junior DevOps Engineer with a passion for automation and cloud infrastructure
data.summary: As a junior DevOps Engineer, I am dedicated to bridging the gap between development and operations, ensuring seamless software delivery and infrastructure management. With a strong background in scripting, cloud platforms, and agile methodologies, I strive to optimize workflows, improve system reliability, and empower teams to achieve their goals. I am eager to contribute my skills and enthusiasm to a dynamic startup environment, where I can continue to grow and make a meaningful impact.

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
bullets: Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform and Ansible
Implemented Kubernetes clusters on AWS and Azure for containerized applications
Monitored and optimized system performance using Prometheus and Grafana
Collaborated with development teams to integrate CI/CD pipelines and ensure seamless releases
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for production environments

projects.name: DevOps Automation Toolkit
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive toolkit for automating infrastructure provisioning, application deployment, and monitoring using a combination of open-source tools and cloud services.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a young, friendly-looking man with short dark hair and a warm smile, wearing a collared shirt and looking directly at the camera.
